transcript: I want to die with nothing left if you die and you die with any knowledge left in your brain that you haven't shared with other people it's just a waste of life like the idea that you could learn something and then share it with no one and then die it's just such a waste it'd be like the guy inventing the wheel and be like nah I'm not sharing it like why what I would love to have be true on my Tombstone not just have it there but what I would love to be true or at least that people say is that like that man died with nothing left to give and that would be a life well lived for me
